string.name: 考验的时刻来了，训练师！

resources.string: The time of trial has come, Trainer!
Capture Pokémon to your heart's content!

string.name: 忠诚度降低，攻击力下降，请及时补充！

resources.string: Loyalty decreased, attack power lowered. Please replenish it!
What do you want to do?

string.name: 宠物忠诚度为0，请立刻补充！

resources.string: Pokémon loyalty is 0! Replenish it immediately!

string.name: 忠诚度过低，宠物不服从主人命令

resources.string: Loyalty is too low, Pokémon is disobeying orders

string.name: 石化效果无法行动，受到的伤害减少30%

resources.string: Petrified effect: Cannot act, damage taken reduced by 30%

string.name: 撕裂效果，减少当前血量的10%

resources.string: Tear effect: Reduces current HP by 10%

string.name: 魅惑效果，不能逃跑，增加捕获宠物的几率

resources.string: Charm effect: Cannot escape, increases Pokémon catch rate

string.name: 禁锢效果，不能逃跑，不能换怪，不能使用道具

resources.string: Imprison effect: Cannot escape, cannot switch Pokémon, cannot use items

string.name: 腐蚀效果，每回合受到一定伤害

resources.string: Corrosion effect: Receives damage every turn

string.name: 封闭效果，不能使用4级以上技能

resources.string: Sealed effect: Cannot use skills level 4 or higher

string.name: 封闭效果，对幽暗鬼王不起作用

resources.string: Sealed effect: Does not affect Umbra King

string.name: 在限定时间里接尽量多的球到框里，最后根据框里球的分数来换取金钱。

resources.string: Catch as many balls as possible in the basket within the time limit. Exchange the score of the balls in the basket for money.
Maybe you'll get it next time.

string.name: 选择你认为会得第一的一只宠物和押注的大小，注数越大获胜后的奖励越丰厚！

resources.string: Choose a Pokémon you think will come in first place and the size of your bet. The higher the bet, the greater the reward after winning!

string.name: 一注：#n投入100金，#n获胜得120金。#n二注：#n投入300金，#n获胜得350金。#n三注：#n投入1000金，#n获胜得1200金。

resources.string: One bet: #nBet 100 Gold, #nWin 120 Gold. #nTwo bets: #nBet 300 Gold, #nWin 350 Gold. #nThree bets: #nBet 1000 Gold, #nWin 1200 Gold.
Please choose the Pokémon to bet on:

string.name: 每喂一个兴奋菇花费10金，可增加一格兴奋度。

resources.string: Feeding one Excitement Mushroom costs 10 Gold and increases Excitement Level by one bar.
One bet 100 Gold#nTwo bets 300 Gold#nThree bets 1000 Gold

string.name: 您当前的训练师等级已达到上限！

resources.string: Your current Trainer level has reached the limit!

string.name: #0，您商店能存放的宠物#7暴增到

resources.string: #0, the number of Pokémon your shop can store has increased dramatically to #7

string.name: #0只不同的宠物，努力获得新宠吧。

resources.string: #0 different Pokémon to level up. Strive to get new Pokémon.

string.name: 此次您没有捕获到全新的宠物，捕获并不是唯一途径，有些宠物需要通过进化才能获得哦。

resources.string: You didn't catch any new Pokémon this time. Catching isn't the only way. Some Pokémon can only be obtained through evolution.

string.name: 个新宠物，这里是王国训练师机构奖励给您的

resources.string: new Pokémon, here are the rewards from the Kingdom Trainer Organization for you

string.name: 个徽章，希望再接再厉哦。

resources.string: badges, I hope you keep up the good work.

string.name: 恭喜您的训练师等级已提升为#7

resources.string: Congratulations, your Trainer level has been raised to #7

string.name: #0，您随身可携带宠物数量#7暴增到

resources.string: #0, the number of Pokémon you can carry has increased dramatically to #7

string.name: #4主线任务#0已更新，点击#7工具包内的主线按钮#0可查看任务表。

resources.string: #4Main Quest#0 has been updated. Click the Main button in the #7Toolkit#0 to view the quest list.

string.name: #4分支任务#0已更新，点击#7工具包内的支线按钮#0可查看任务表。

resources.string: #4Side Quest#0 has been updated. Click the Side button in the #7Toolkit#0 to view the quest list.
Are you sure you want to

string.name: 游戏暂停，点击屏幕返回。

resources.string: Game paused, tap the screen to return.

string.name: 购买8000金#n购买80000金#n购买10徽章#n购买50徽章#n宠物升级#n购买神龟#n正版验证#n战斗复活#n短信商城

resources.string: Buy 8000 Gold#nBuy 80000 Gold#nBuy 10 Badges#nBuy 50 Badges#nPokémon Upgrade#nBuy Divine Turtle#nGenuine Verification#nBattle Revive#nSMS Shop
It's already dead and cannot be used!

string.name: 宠物空间已满，无法获得新的宠物，请整理寄存所空出一个空间。

resources.string: Pokémon storage is full, you can't get a new Pokémon. Please free up space in the Pokémon Center.
Experience is full, you can hatch now.

string.name: 奇异兽不仅跑得快而且可以不遇敌，现提供试骑体验，正版验证后需购买！

resources.string: The Mystic Beast not only runs fast but also can avoid encounters. A trial ride is provided now, and purchase is required after genuine verification!

string.name: 携带的宠物全都牺牲了!

resources.string: All Pokémon in your party have fainted!

string.name: 您的宠物已经无法获得经验

resources.string: Your Pokémon can no longer gain experience

string.name: 身上必须携带一只能参战的宠物！

resources.string: You must carry at least one Pokémon that can battle!

string.name: 恭喜您把所有的宠物都收集齐了

resources.string: Congratulations on collecting all the Pokémon!

string.name: 之前未保存的部分将会丢失，是否继续？

resources.string: Unsaved progress will be lost. Continue?
Charmed by the glowing eyes of
Cannot be caught due to special circumstances!

string.name: 沉睡之歌效果，怪物强制换场！

resources.string: Lullaby effect: Forces Pokémon to switch out!

string.name: 所能携带的宠物已经达到上限！

resources.string: The number of Pokémon you can carry has reached the limit!

string.name: 放生的宠物将会消失，是否继续？

resources.string: The released Pokémon will disappear, continue?
Current Pokémon cannot participate in battle
The Pokémon you carry has been healed.
Ran away with tears in its eyes!
Glared at you and ran away!

string.name: 战斗失败了,训练师的梦想不能实现了!

resources.string: Battle failed, the Trainer's dream cannot be realized!
Are you sure you want to continue the game?

string.name: 等级没有达到15级，不能进化！
等级没有达到25级，不能进化！
等级没有达到30级，不能进化！
这将清除您之前的所有记录，是否继续？

resources.string: This will erase all your previous records, continue?

string.name: 金属克野兽，野兽克植物，植物克飞行，飞行克海洋，海洋克金属

resources.string: Metal beats Beast, Beast beats Plant, Plant beats Flying, Flying beats Ocean, Ocean beats Metal

string.name: 钥匙，钥匙在商店中可以购买。

resources.string: Key, the key can be purchased in the store.

string.name: 宝箱，宝箱在战斗后一定几率获得。

resources.string: Treasure chest, the treasure chest has a certain chance to be obtained after battle.
(Turning off sound makes the game smoother)

string.name: 下坐骑#n植物坐骑#n金属坐骑#n飞行坐骑#n野兽坐骑#n海洋坐骑#n无此坐骑

resources.string: Dismount#nPlant Mount#nMetal Mount#nFlying Mount#nBeast Mount#nOcean Mount#nNo such mount
You haven't obtained this mount yet
Can only be used in water

string.name: 孵化所已经没有空位了

resources.string: There are no more empty slots in the hatchery
